ygData.subject: I have a question about Lambent
ygData.msgSnippet: For the Lambent BP quest... has anyone done it within the last month or two? Because to do it you need a carapace from Lower Guk,,, and on some websites it
ygData.messageBody:
For the Lambent BP quest... has anyone done it within the last month or two?

Because to do it you need a carapace from Lower Guk,,, and on some websites
it says its no drop and the like below the details where players post a few
of them say that it is not no drop anymore and u can get it with any
character

I am wondering about this because i already have the gypsy lute and i wanna
know if i have to get carapace with the same guy or someone different?

If anyone know i could use the info... thanks bye

-Tom
